name: Seth Meyers
monologue: Today is President’s Day and you just know Trump was up at the crack of dawn, ready to open presents.

name: Seth Meyers
monologue: President Trump took office one month ago today. Wow, it’s hard to believe the past few years have only been a month!

name: Seth Meyers
monologue: At a recent dinner while President Trump invited other attendees to order whatever they wanted, Trump demanded Chris Christie have the White House meatloaf. Coincidentally, “White House Meatloaf” is also the position Trump is considering him for.

name: Seth Meyers
monologue: At a rally this weekend, President Trump compared himself to Abraham Lincoln, who he claimed, “fought with the media and called them out.” Yup, that’s who Abraham Lincoln was most famous for warring with. The media.
